newsitem.title: EU: EP FISHERIES COMMITTEE AGENDA - APRIL 16-17.
newsitem.headline: EP FISHERIES COMMITTEE AGENDA - APRIL 16-17.

text.p: Committee on Fisheries [[ Wednesday 16 April 1997 ]] PUBLIC MEETING 0. 1. Adoption of draft agenda (PE222.210 ) 2. Chairman's announcements In the presence of the Commission 3. International fisheries agreements (T04619) INI0475 INI0475 B4-0126/96 B4-0126/96 COS0484 COM(96)0488 C4-0590/96 + PECH Fond R CRAMPTON Peter D. (PSE) (PE220.881) + PECH Fond CRAMPTON Peter D. (PSE) (PE220.881 ) - Vote on and adoption of draft report 4. EC ratification of the Agreement for implementing the UN Convention on the Law of the Sea (fish stock conservation) (T05019) CNS96238 COM(96)0472 C4-0551/96 + PECH Fond R VARELA SUANZES-CARPE (PPE) (PE220.879 ) - Vote on and adoption of draft report 5. Fisheries agreement with S t o Tome e Principe from 1 June 1996 to 31 May 1999 (proposal for decision and regulation) (T04946) CNS96199 COM(96)0394 C4-0485/96 + PECH Fond R MACARTNEY William J. (PE219.831 ) (ARE) - Vote on and adoption of draft report 6. Community system for fisheries and aquaculture - amendment of Regulation (EEC) No 3760/92 (T04991) CNS96183 COM(96)0350 C4-0538/96 + PECH Fond R SOUCHET Dominique. (EDN) (PE220.890 ) - Vote on and adoption of draft report 7. Provisions for the application of control measures adopted by NAFO (amending Reg. 189/92)('hail system') (T05344) CNS96309 COM(96)0684 C4-0034/97 CNS96310 COM(96)0685 C4-0035/97 + PECH Fond R TEVERSON Robin. (ELD) (PE220.885 ) + PECH Fond TEVERSON Robin. (ELD) (PE220.885) - Exchange of views - Vote on and adoption of draft report 8. Fishing off the coast of Senegal from 2 October to 1 November 1996: interim extension of the agreement (T05325) CNS96287 COM(96)0611 C4-0032/97 + PECH Fond R PERY Nicole. (PSE) (PE220.889 ) - Consideration of draft report 9. Presentation by the Commission of the new protocol to the EC-Senegal fisheries agreement 9.1 Coordinators' meeting after the meeting 17 April from 9 a.m. to 12.30 p.m. 10. ROUND TABLE 10.1 ON THE COMMON FISHERIES POLICY AFTER THE YEAR 2002 10.2 Exchange of views attended by: - Mrs BONINO, Commissioner responsible for fisheries - Mr CAVACO, Director-General of the Commission's DG XIV - representatives of the Commission and of EUROPECHE/COGECA 17 April at 3 p.m. 11. Statement by Mr CAVACO on: - the outcome of the Fisheries Council of 14/15 April 1997 - the fisheries budget for 1998 - international fisheries agreements 12. Statement by the Commission on the outcome of the Conference on the Protection of the North Sea 13. Reference laboratories for the monitoring of marine biotoxins (amendment of Decision 93/383/EEC) (T04999) CNS96234 COM(96)0464 C4-0547/96 + PECH Fond R MACARTNEY William J. (ARE) - Exchange of views (possibly) 14. Decision on procedure (possibly) 15. Appointment of rapporteurs and draftsmen - decisions on procedure (possibly) 16. Any other business 17. Date of next meeting in Brussels (PE/XVII/OJ/97-07 ) - FIN - END OF DOCUMENT.
